Workflow.Name: Contact Retrieval V5
Workflow.Description: This flow is triggered manually and searches for users based on input text. It initializes a variable, filters the search results, and selects specific user details. These details are then joined into a formatted string, which is appended to a variable. Finally, the flow responds with the formatted string.

Description.description: This flow is triggered manually and searches for users based on input text. It initializes a variable, filters the search results, and selects specific user details. These details are then joined into a formatted string, which is appended to a variable. Finally, the flow responds with the formatted string.
